fields.Title: WHIRLING F2 / TAPE PLAYER
fields.Condition: Variable["TASK.listen_to_merc_tape"] == true  and  Variable["TASK.listen_to_merc_tape_done"] == false  and  CheckItem("boombox") == false
fields.Description: You can click on tape player -- it has broken down while you were gone. Can't listen to any tapes now, best you find a new one from Roy.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""This would have been *very* helpfu..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "This would have been *very* helpful with the 'Megamix'." He stares at the tape player. "But it isn't anymore."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't even flinch...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant doesn't even flinch. "Anyway, let's try to find a new tape player. Perhaps we should talk to Roy at the pawnshop."

fields.Title: Half Light: "Fuck is that going to achieve? Bein..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Fuck is that going to achieve? Being a smart-ass... making your nostrils flare.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "There is no fixing this one."
fields.Dialogue Text: There is no fixing this one.

fields.Title: You: "Great. What now?"
fields.Dialogue Text: Great. What now?

fields.Title: You: "Well shit."
fields.Dialogue Text: Well shit.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course," he notes. "Anyway, we..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course," he notes. "Anyway, we should try to find a new tape player. There's a pawnshop near the water lock, south of here. Maybe they have a spare."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant doesn't even flinch...."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant doesn't even flinch. "Anyway, let's try to find a new tape player. There's a pawnshop near the water lock, maybe they have a spare."

fields.Title: You: "What should I do now, Stereo 8 Play..."
fields.Dialogue Text: What should I do now, Stereo 8 Player?

fields.Title: You: ""It's not *my* fault.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "It's not *my* fault."

fields.Title: You: ""Fuck off, Kim.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Fuck off, Kim."

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My Kineema only comes with a radio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My Kineema only comes with a radio," he ponders. "Let's try to find a new tape player. Perhaps we should talk to Roy at the pawnshop -- he has stuff."

fields.Title: Stereo 8 Player: "The compact tape player is still an..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The compact tape player is still and silent. Seems it has completely broken down now.

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah... any ideas?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah... any ideas?"

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""My Kineema only comes with a radio..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "My Kineema only comes with a radio," he ponders. "We should try to find a new tape player. There's a pawnshop near the water lock, south of here. Maybe they have a spare."

fields.Title: Stereo 8 Player: "The broken tape player doesn't have..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The broken tape player doesn't have the ability to respond. But Kim would.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "Best find a new player. A boombox,..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Best find a new player. A boombox, funky style? Maybe the guy at the pawnshop can help out?

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""Of course," he notes. "We should t..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Of course," he notes. "We should try to find a new tape player. Perhaps we can talk to Roy at the pawnshop south of here -- he had stuff."

fields.Title: Encyclopedia: "The machine was made in Revachol by..."
fields.Dialogue Text: The machine was made in Revachol by a company called Lemercier -- their logo depicts the triple-towered Delta skyline. It was supposedly built to last.

fields.Title: Interfacing: "I guess the only thing to do is to..."
fields.Dialogue Text: I guess the only thing to do is to find a new player. Might be one waiting for you out there somewhere.
